typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> DataLakeSource
DataLakeSource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
